scripts.create_application: read -p 'enter application name (use `_` for space): ' application_name; read -p 'enter template name (default `bootstrap_template`): ' template_name;cp -R src/${template_name:-bootstrap_template} src/$application_name
scripts.deploy: cp src/pioneer_demo -R ../web2py/applications && cp src/bootstrap_template -R ../web2py/applications && cp src/bootstrap_tutorial -R ../web2py/applications
scripts.build: tar -C src --exclude='pioneer_demo/errors/*' --exclude='pioneer_demo/sessions/*' -czvf web2py.app.pioneer_demo.w2p pioneer_demo/ && mv -f web2py.app.pioneer_demo.w2p releases
